original_text: Everyone there was very afraid. They praised God and said, ‘A great prophet of God has appeared among us. God has come to save his people!’
korean_text: 모든 사람이 두려워하며 하나님께 영광을 돌려 이르되 큰 선지자가 우리 가운데 일어나셨다 하고 또 하나님께서 자기 백성을 돌보셨다 하더라

sentences.original_text: 'A great prophet of God has appeared among us.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 위대한 선지자가 우리 가운데 나타나셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: God has come to save his people!'
